name: playwright-ts-cucumber-DM project
description: Playwright Cucumber TS framework - for Daily Mail application

scripts.e2etest: cross-env ENV=prod cucumber-js e2e/features/*.feature --require e2e/steps/*.ts --require e2e/pages/*.ts --require e2e/support/*.ts
scripts.e2etestdocker: cross-env ENV=prod cucumber-js app/e2e/features/*.feature --require app/e2e/steps/*.ts --require app/e2e/pages/*.ts --require app/e2e/support/*.ts

author: Rajashekhar NG
